item.title: PK points = NPC points
item.dc:creator: @Blood_zeus Blood zeus
item.description:
@Blood_zeus wrote:

So i’m guessing this is the code for Player kills player = 1 point
how would i change it to Players kills NPC = 1 point,

Thanks, =)

if(c.duelStatus != 6) { //c.killerId = c.getCombat().getKillerId(c.playerId); c.killerId = findKiller(); Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[c.killerId]; if(o != null) { if(!(c.npcIndex > 0) && c.inPits ==true){ } if (c.killerId != c.npcIndex) o.sendMessage("You have defeated "+Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName)+"!"); c.playerKilled = c.playerId; if(!PlayerKilling.hostOnList(o, c.connectedFrom)) { PlayerKilling.addHostToList(o, c.connectedFrom); o.pkPoints++; o.sendMessage("You have received a point, you now have "+o.pkPoints+" pk points."); } else { o.sendMessage("You have recently defeated "+c.playerName+", you don't receive any pk points."); } if(o.duelStatus == 5) { o.duelStatus++; } } }

Read full topic
